alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:12PM AKST until December 07 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 40 mph. * WHERE...Kivalina and Red Dog Dock and Baldwin Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will develop today and continue into early Thursday. The worst conditions are expected this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock
